Question: Doinglab, Inc. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
DoingLab, Inc.

Product: FoodLens 2.0 (CaloAI)

- Automatically measures nutrient information by taking a picture of food
- Recognizes nutrients based on the ingredients in food
- Measures and recognizes not only Korean food but also different cuisines from around the world
- Provides customized information to manage and record diet
- Links with wearable devices for dietary trend management
- Showcased at CES 2023, targeting the global market
- Website: https://www.doinglab.com/en/
- Contact: Jason Park, Sales Manager, +82 10-9306-0469, jasonpark@doinglab.com
Summary_cn:
DoingLab公司。

产品：FoodLens 2.0（CaloAI）

- 通过拍摄食物照片自动测量营养信息
- 根据食物成分识别营养物质
- 测量和识别不仅韩国食品，还包括来自世界各地的不同菜系
- 提供定制信息以管理和记录饮食
- 与可穿戴设备连接，进行饮食趋势管理
- 在CES 2023上展出，面向全球市场
- 网站：https://www.doinglab.com/en/
- 联系人：Jason Park，销售经理，+82 10-9306-0469，jasonpark@doinglab.com
